author: potuz
content: Am I right that without 3074, inclusion list validation (not the payload but the inclusion list sidecar) is trivially verifyable without executing anything if we allow only one transaction per address? and as soon as we include 3074, then IL validation requires executing all transactions?

author: potuz
content: damn, so ePBS seems simpler than ILs in the end lol... can we have ePBS without ILs ? üòù  getting tricky to write down the full design doc

author: robocopsgonemad
content: was there a recording of the last IL call?

content: I think there was one in the <#745077610685661265> channel
